thread.title: Budget Hotel does exactly what it says on the tin
thread.title_full: Budget Hotel does exactly what it says on the tin - Review of Hotel ibis budget London City Airport, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Karyn C
title: Budget Hotel does exactly what it says on the tin
text: Great place to stay. A little out of the city but the DLR brings you very close to the hotel. The hotel is small and quiet, staff are lovely and accommodating. Shower is right beside the bed and there was no wardrobe but cannot complain for the price you get
